headline: Feel the Love. Heal the Hate. Embrace the Fear.
description: If food and body-acceptance is an area of your life you just can't seem to figure out, welcome. Join us and 27+ world renowned authors, activists, and researchers as we cut through conventions to change the dialogue around dieting and body confidence.
offer: Mark your calendar for an inspirational week of candid conversations and authentic advice to help redefine your relationship to food, body, and self.
